about_the_game:
If you want to support us, please purchase this DLC!
This DLC offers all of the following exclusive benefits.

13 Exclusive Costumes that can change Chara's appearance

  • Rabbit Costume
  • Silk Dress Costume
  • Maid Costume
  • Nurse Costume
  • Underwear Costume
  • Towel Costume
  • Office Costume
  • Nun Costume
  • Bodysuit Costume
  • Student Teacher Costume
  • Casual Costume
  • International Student Costume
  • Black Rose Costume

2 of Chara's special high-end exclusive costumes with style change feature

  • Armor Costume
  • Aesthetic Costume

Exclusive Reward Fellow

  • Shizuka
(After purchasing DLC, you can recruit it at the graveyard.)

5 Exclusive Costumes that can change your colleague's appearance

  • Catarina Swimsuit Costume
  • Emily Sailor Costume
  • Charlotte Rabbit Costume
  • Shizuka Zip-Up Costume
  • Priscilla Pajama Costume

Special Exclusive Item

  • Non-drying Potion
(It's a permanent potion that will be recharged upon return to the graveyard.)

Note: This DLC is a DLC that integrates the products of DLCs that have been discontinued.
If you have a history of purchasing previous DLCs, please be aware of duplicate purchases.

All components included in this DLC cannot be acquired by any other means.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult-only content (exposed costumes, body exposure.) However, sexual activity is not included.

name: Executioner Girls - Legacy Pack
short_description: It is a DLC with all the existing DLC rewards integrated. Includes 20 exclusive costumes, special colleagues and special item.
